The Climate Change and Energy Transition Act, nke a na-akpọ Law 7/2021, nke ụbọchị iri abụo n'ọnwa Mee, gbasara mgbanwe ihu igwe na mgbanwe ike (na Spanish: Ley 7/2021) de 20 de mayo, de cambio climático y transición energética) bụ iwu Spanish nke natara Royal Assent n'ubochi irí abụọ n'ọnwa Mee 2021, wee bido n'ubochi irí abụọ na abụọ n'ọnwa Mee 2021
Ebumnuche ya bụ iji hụ na Spain na-agbaso ebumnuche nke nkwekọrịta Paris
Iwu ahụ bụ nke ụlọ abụọ nke Cortes Generales (ụlọ omebe iwu nke Spain) kwadoro ma bụrụ nke Eze Felipe VI kwadoro.
Ọtụtụ n'ime usoro ndị a tụlere n'iwu a bụ:

Nzukọ ndị omebe iwu kwadoro iwu ahụ n'ubochi asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel n'afọ 2021 ma zigara ya na Senate màkà nkwado ikpeazụ ya. Senate kwadoro iwu ahụ n'ubochi irí abụọ na asatọ n'ọnwa Eprel 2021 na mgbanwe ụfọdụ.
N'abalị iri na atọ n'ọnwa Mee n'afọ 2021, ndị omebe iwu mèrè ntuli aka ikpeazụ na ederede ahụ
Iwu ahụ kwadoro site n'aka ọtụtụ ndị nọ n'ụlọ ahụ, na nkwado nkè ndị otu niile ma e wezụga Vox, nke tụụrụ vootu megide, na PP na Más País-Verdes Equo, nke jụrụ.
Ụfọdụ ndị ọkachamara n'ọhịa ahụ akatọọla enweghị oké ọchịchọ nke iwu na ihe ize ndụ ya nke ịbụ "ónyé a mụrụ agadi". Greenpeace na-ewere na ebumnuche ndị ahụ ezughị iji lụso ọnọdụ ihu igwe ọgụ.
